name: Little Sprouts
description:
Little Sprouts is a cute puzzle solving game meant for undergraduate Human Development and Family Studies students. The game is a capstone to the early childhood development class at the University of Wisconsin: Stout.

Take on the role of a new parent along with the responsibility to keep your child safe. Determine potential threats within the time limit and watch as your baby explores the (hopefully) safe environment. Learn from your mistakes and discover the different needs of a child as they grow up through different developmental stages.
